lastWorkedDate.label: What date did you last work at %s?
lastWorkedDate.hint:
If you worked a night shift, use the date that your shift ended.

For example, %s

errors.required: Enter the date you last worked
errors.missingDay: Date you last worked must include a day
errors.missingMonth: Date you last worked must include a month
errors.missingYear: Date you last worked must include a year
errors.missingDayAndMonth: Date you last worked must include a day and a month
errors.missingDayAndYear: Date you last worked must include a day and a year
errors.missingMonthAndYear: Date you last worked must include a month and a year
errors.badFormatYear: Enter the date you last worked with a year in the right format, for example 2001 not 01
errors.notReal: Enter a real date for your last day worked
errors.notRealDigits: Enter a real date for your last day worked using only digits
errors.inFuture: Date you last worked must be today or in the past
